name: Daily Crypto RSI-VWAP Momentum Strategy
description: Momentum strategy trading daily bars of top-cap crypto (BTC & ETH). Long entries when RSI-14 crosses above 50, close > 10-day VWAP and volume ≥120 % of its 20-day average (approximated by VWAP-RSI component). Positions sized at 3 % equity via fixed-fraction sizer. Protective stop 5 % below entry (proxy for trailing) and take-profit at 10 % (2× risk).
